channel.title: Unreal Tournament 3
channel.description: Talk about Unreal Tournament 3 for the PC, PS3, or Xbox 360.

item.title: UT3 servers gone?

item.content:encoded: Right now it can quite hard to find an UT3 server if you can find one at all. View attachment 103540

item.title: GameFront File Storing Policy Changed!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Tux Android)
item.dc:creator: Tux Android
item.content:encoded:
NOTICE: GameFront's "Terrible" File Hosting FAQ

I don't host any files or upload hardly any, but for the people that do this must suck big time. I can see a lot of old UT99/UT2004/UT3 maps and mods just disappearing completely if not hosted somewhere else. It's a good thing I'm almost done downloading what I want.

Anyway, here's what's in the link:
http://www.gamefront.com/file-hosting-faq/

GameFront File Hosting Rules Changelog â€“ 11-05-2012...

GameFront File Storing Policy Changed!

item.title: Best Anti-Virus for UT3
item.author: invalid@example.com (Fuzz)
item.dc:creator: Fuzz
item.content:encoded:
I happen to be in the process of replacing my anti-virus and there are quite a few on the market. I would like to hear what anvi-virus works best for you. A sub-category would be the best free anti-virus according to the UT3 users.

I tried BitDefender Free recently and it's really slow on start up whenever UT3 loads anything.

Avira got pop-up ads every day.

I rather go with a free version anti-virus because I don't want to pay yearly fees.

I would like to see a postalbabes for ut3
maybe a nude one ;o

item.title: UT3 Duel & TDM Demos on Youtube (for memories) 2nd attempt ..
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lw)f)
item.dc:creator: Lw)f
item.content:encoded:
Hi,


As some of you may as noticed, i'm uploading to youtube when i have a bit of time some old ut3 demos from former highskill Europeans players from the
past, and also some more recent ones sometimes. It's uploaded for the sake of the remembering if i can say, so ppl can see there were
big teams and big names involved in ut3, those 2 previous factors, creating some awesome matches.
It can also help some 'new comers' (yes, even i, have a lot of difficulties to even say that word...

UT3 Duel & TDM Demos on Youtube (for memories) 2nd attempt ..

item.title: Fury - is this a coincidence??
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mr Zero)
item.dc:creator: Mr Zero
item.content:encoded:
I just realized something. Anyone here played Battlezone? It's a 1998 FP/RTS game. There's a large alien aircraft called Fury. It has a beam-like main weapon which is very powerful, and it can quickly "jump" from one place to another.

Now this sounds very much like the Fury in UT3. Ok, I tend to find funny similarities but just think about it: same name, alien (Necris?) origins, weapon of same style, ability to do speed boosts. And it's made of special strain of Bio-metal while the UT...

Fury - is this a coincidence??

item.title: Crotale's Ini tweaks
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trustingsoup)
item.dc:creator: Trustingsoup
item.content:encoded:
I found these on google as a cached page and it seemed a shame to lose them, so here they are. Many thanks to Crotale for the effort.

Hi everyone. After doing some searching through this forum and the Epic forums for INI tweaks, etc, for my own system, I figured I would start a thread for all of us to input tweaks and adjustments for people to use. So, please post your tips, tweaks and fixes.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Remember to back up your .ini and/or .int files prior to making any...

Crotale's Ini tweaks

item.title: I'm thinking of getting UT3 Black from Steam
item.author: invalid@example.com (Stigmata)
item.dc:creator: Stigmata
item.content:encoded: I've played the PS3 version and the Xbox360 version when it came out, but I didn't have a PC I thought it would be worth playing on until now. I know it got patched to allow for it to run on Epic servers. Anyone still play? Worth installing?

item.title: UT3 controls defaulting
item.author: invalid@example.com (AMmayhem)
item.dc:creator: AMmayhem
item.content:encoded:
I never play a game with default key mapping. I've twice gone into the menu, changed the keys to how I like them, and go on to play, no problem. But upon playing the game after having exiting, all my controls reset to default. Even volume levels reset to default, however graphic changes and weapon priority do not.

Any fix to this?

item.title: Changing gunner using an Xbox360 controller
item.author: invalid@example.com (Unreal4Eva)
item.dc:creator: Unreal4Eva
item.content:encoded:
Having problems with switching to Gunner seat in the Goliath along with the other vehicles after applying Full XBox360 Controller support in my UTInput.ini file from TPSFan's post over at Epic Forums https://forums.epicgames.com/threads/586300-Full-Xbox360-Controller-Support-(How-To) .

Do anyone know how to correct this?

item.title: Why cant I log on to a ut3 server?
item.author: invalid@example.com (jim1174)
item.dc:creator: jim1174
item.content:encoded: The other day I had trouble logging on to the game. I found out that unreal was using new servers and not the old one. I found a patch online called ut3 gs patch. after i cut and pasted it to my unreal 3 directory I was able to log into the game. The problem is When I try and join one of the servers I played on before it says " connection failed".

UT99 & 2K4 Map Remakes / Conversions 50+ maps

Since this thread has evolved - i'm updating as needed the original post is in the code box. Below are a list of Finals, WIP / Beta's, & Requests. - I'll be attempting to keep this list updated and ongoing, i have plans to be around for a while so i should be able to maintain it. (My buddy Sneh has a similar list @Epic but he hasn't been around much)...

UT99 & 2K4 Map Remakes / Conversions

item.title: The new master server patch
item.author: invalid@example.com (oldkawman)
item.dc:creator: oldkawman
item.content:encoded:
I have installed it and it works. I kept my same player names since Gametracker still works.

Online player number have been up since the UT4 anouncement. I will switch to UT4 when it's ready.

Too bad about stats and friends. GameSpy abandoned all the games. This should be a lessons learned. Never trust a 3rd party like that again.

Epics UT3 forums has the link to the new UT3.exe zip file and more info for those who still play online.

item.title: reinstalling UT3 ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded:
Well, with all the crazyness with servers going to and whatnot, I would like to know the best way to reinstall UT3. My present install is on my WinXP machine built in 2009 and it's still running strong, but I want to make sure UT3 continues if the XP system dies and I want to be safe for online games. I plan on doing this in about a month on my Asus ROG Win8.1 laptop. I know this works with UT and UT2004 as long as you don't try and get online with both computers. How about UT3? Can I use...

reinstalling UT3 ?

item.title: dead links?

item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded:
OK, so I've been through all the pages of UT3 maps (here at Epic and UP) and of all the ones I was interested in it seems only 7 have dead links. Anyone know where we can download any of these? Some may have already been discussed in other threads and be released as other game types, but I'm only interested in what I posted so go ahead and post your comments anyway here.

CTF-Elysium (by Robo422)
CTF-Sandstorm (by ShadeMistress)
CTF-Suspense (by ShadeMistress)
XXX DM-AlienFlow (by...

dead links?

item.title: Unreal Tournament 3 Crashing on Startup: KERNELBASE.dll not found
item.author: invalid@example.com (FuLLBLeeD)
item.dc:creator: FuLLBLeeD
item.content:encoded:
Repost from Epic Forums but yeah I still play this game and its annoying it crashes on startup now.

So seemingly out of nowhere, my UT3 crashes on startup. This is incredibly odd as it never used to do this before. I just updated my video drivers and tried verifying integrity on Steam so neither of those is the problem. It must have something to do with the Kernelbase.dll not being found in the log because its never crashed on startup before.


If anyone has any idea how to fix this...

Unreal Tournament 3 Crashing on Startup: KERNELBASE.dll not found
